DESC.PARA: A is limited to being > 0. To model negative constant amplitudes, multiple by -1 in Sherpa. The scale1d model is simply the 'const1d' model with the integrate flag turned off by default. If a user sets scale1d as a model with an integrated data set, it will behave as a simple constant by default.
The integration of models in Sherpa is controlled by an integration flag in each model structure. Refer to "ahelp integrate" for information on integrating model components.
